phrases: Why did not you wake me up?!
I tried three times but you did not wake up,
so I thought you must be tired and let you sleep.
Do not put on that kind brother act, just try four times from tomorrow on!
We are running a marathon in the third period.
I need to eat or I will die.
Clean up after you are done eating.
Rare to see you around here.
How long are you going to hold on to it?
Grudges about food can go on for seven generations!
To prevent that we must settle it here and now!
Hey, I am talking to you!
We are freshmen in the Special Advancement department, just like you!
And how may I help you?
I thought the shop may sell out quick...
Please have some if you would like.
Our young teacher is popular with girls.
They are so different even though they are brothers...
Why are you getting so familiar?!
Sorry, I promised my brother to have lunch with him.
Did not they make lunch for you?
Why did not you take it?
I could not eat all three and choosing just one could get really ugly.
This is a school cafeteria and yet there is lobster and stuff!
It is because the True Cross Academy is mostly for rich kids.
So I am finally one of the celebs?!
First we need to buy food tickets from that vending machine.
That is one zero too much there!
I told you, this is a school for rich kids.
I will treat you to the cheapest, 1800 yen A lunch meal!
Lower the prices of the cafeteria?
To provide first class meals, we buy first class ingredients and hire first class chefs.
Why does the cafeteria have to be first class?!
Experiencing first class makes your lives fuller.
Says he and then eats instant ramen...
Then at least give me money for living expenses!
How could I totally forget about that?
The mysterious bill, thought to exist only in urban legends!
With this I could buy ten sandwiches!
Is it fine if I pay that every month on the 10th?
You mean this is for one month?!
And I am supposed to live off that, you dolt?!
Then how about a 100 yen bill?
By the way, recently I have been somewhat obsessed with Taisuke Itagaki.
I do not give a damn about your obsession!
Man does not live by bread alone.
Sermons will not fill my stomach.
Can you be satisfied with 2000 yen a month?
I work as a teacher and I get my Exorcist salary as well.
There is a way to keep you from starving to death.
Supermarket Nico-Nico-Hall Open 24/7 True Cross Shop
I will pay for the ingredients.
You can make lunch for the both of us.
That way I will save some money and you will not have trouble with lunch, either.
After all, cooking is one of the few things you are good at.
Not to mention guys who can cook are popular.
If Rin cooks for us he will wake up in time, and if girls offer me lunch like today,
I can escape by saying that I brought my own lunch without sounding strange.
This plan is like taking down two birds with one stone!
Was there a kitchen in the room?
You could use the dorm kitchen.
It is just the two of us in the old dorm anyway.
You really do not have to do it so late in the night.
I make the side dishes the previous night and put them in the fridge.
Then you take the cold lunch with you in the morning,
and it will be just the right temperature to eat by lunchtime.
This is like common sense for homemakers.
I wish you were this good at studying, too...
Just do your damn business and go to sleep!
What the hell did you call me?!
No matter how hungry you are, there are things you are not supposed to do!
You ate all the side dishes that I made for today's lunch!
As if I would do such a thing!
It is just the two of us in this dorm, is not it?
Everyday at mealtimes our food was prepared...
I did not even think about it, but who cooked it?
So you were making our meals every day?
As if I would do that!
I am just a temporary replacement.
Ukobach was the one making your meals.
It is the spirit of the fireplace, if I recall correctly.
It sneaks in the kitchen while people sleep and makes meals more delicious...
And that is the correct answer, Mr Okumura.
He was working here as my familiar.
But yesterday you used the kitchen and trespassed his territory without permission,
so he became sulky and started boycotting it.
I understand the reasons, but what the hell is this?
Special Imp Oatmeal a la Mephisto!
Wait, do not you dare follow her!
Reasons aside, the misbehavior of the familiar is the misbehavior of its master.
Therefore I will be taking care of your meals until Ukobach recovers his mood.
Then I will be your cook forever.
Beating it up would not help much...
Everything's cleaned up just as it used to be.
If you do not want to work, get lost already!
You are not the only one around who can cook!
Sir Pheles was with him so I was not worried when I left...
But now I have a bad feeling.
What on earth is going on here?
Using all their skills and strength!
They matched the best of their abilities against each other, thus giving birth to a new friendship.
That fried rice was damn good!
My pork and rice was not bad either, you say?
Let us make the ultimate lunch!
I am sure we can do it together!
He is unbelieveable in so many ways.
You are not just good at studying but you are also a great cook!
Yeah, my brother's really good at cooking.
Impress them with my cooking skills just like that!
You can make such a lunch by yourself, so cool!
And thus I will be popular with the girls, for the first time in my life?
There is no way such a brute could cook at all.
Will you teach me how to cook?
He must have been very hungry.
Do not even look, idiocy is contagious.
Guys who can cook are popular, my ass.
I just let Yukio take credit for this, too.
The malachites arrived, so I brought you your order.
Since you came all this way, how about some tea?
Barging into Okumura's dorm like that.
I am sure she is just a maid or something like that!
Since when do you offer tea to a maid?
Anyway, if we give up here the lunches we made will go to waste!
Let us wait until that chick leaves.
He is the cook of our dorm.
He made this tea as well.
Do not worry, I have the magic key connecting to the shop.
I walked all the way here.
How long are you going to wave?
You are happy if someone says it is delicious?
That chick is not coming out.
Could she be staying in Okumura's room?
Yeah, someone is been cooking here.
The side dishes for tomorrow's lunch?
Could it be that chick made these?
Please make some fried shrimp too!
He would not even touch the lunches we made...
But he eats what that chick cooked?
I do not even want to think about it, but I think I know what happened here.
When you are making a stew, you add ginger and a bay leaf to suppress the smell of meat.
To think that he forgot it...
What are you trying to make?!
Ukobach, did not you say that...
If someone eats your cooking and says it is delicious...
It has egg she will pieces in it!
If you do not like it, you do not have to eat it!
We cook because we want to make someone happy when they eat it.
We are happy if someone says that it is good.
That is why I like to cook, why I want to cook!
Who would call that thing you are making good?!
Why will not you eat it?
Even though I made it for you...
I wanted you to eat it, Yukio...
Eat the lunches they put their hearts into making!
I bet it is nice and salty, and totally delicious!
So he ate that huge amount of food alone, without leaving a bite?
Do not worry about the girls, they are attending classes today as usual.
Thanks to you, Ukobach cheered up, too.
You worked hard, just rest for a few more days!
To make you recover fast, Ukobach and I made you this special stamina meal!
Do not hold back, dig in!
I am getting scared of food...
From next week, we will be going to a week-long training camp for the exams.
Luxury lunch xxx00 yen, Special lunch 8000 yen, Standard lunch 6000 yen, Hamburger, Pork cutlet curry
Miso... 5800 yen,...meal (with dessert) xx800 yen, Tea snack meal 12000 yen, Great fatty tuna 105xxx yen,...curry, Lordly meal, Shark fin so...
sei wo uke sorezore ga jinsei wo ouka
nou no black box wo shiru sore wa kou ka
you wa limit line wo subete ryouga
saa ikou ka fumidasu sore wa kyou da
yappa hibi wa ika sen kou sotsunaku konashitecha no no
stop nagare wo mikiwamena mazu mono to mo sezu ikou ze (here we go)
todokanu mono ya kagiri aru mono ni
atsuku naru mune wo osaetsukeru no wa
rikai mo sezu osaetsukeyou to shitekita
ano otonatachi to onaji jan ka yo
mune wo moyasu hi wa dare ni mo keseya shinai
sora kara furu kuroi ame ga kono mi nurashi furitomanakutomo
mada ore wa kawareru jibun de kaetemiseru
kore ga sou pride sorezore no basho de
mada mada kieru na kokoro no hi wo
mada mada ikeru zo ikeru zo
After birth, people live as they wish
They then learn the black box in their head; is that bliss?
Just cross over, beyond the line of your limit
Let us go, take a step, and I mean this minute
Life's a bitch, so if it is easy, you are doing it wrong
Stop, which way is the world going?
Then ignore it and go wherever (here we go)
There are things I could never have, things with time
Is there a reason I force my heart upon them?
I never tried to understand, I just forced it on them
I am no better than those lifeless adults
Even if it is just a pipe dream I could never have
But no one can put out the fire in my heart
The black rain may pour hard and leave me drenched
But I know I can change, I will change myself
This is my pride, what makes up my core
I will not let my fire be put out; not yet
I will keep going, and I will never stop
(Please be) Dakara moshi kono mune ga
(With me) Michi ni mayou hi ni wa
Mirai e no tobira wo hiraite hoshii
This is what they call fate.
the way we keep on shining together.
Let us keep our gazes locked
so it will not fade away.
(Please be) Maybe the day will come
(With me) that we will lose our way
while looking for the door to the future.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off
So do not let go of my hand.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
